meanings.sent1: The ozonizers in the lab help clean the air by releasing ozone.
meanings.sent2: The ozonizers in the water treatment plant are essential for purifying the water.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous scientist accidentally turned on all the ozonizers at once, creating a cloud of ozone in the room.
meanings.sent4: The ozonizers worked tirelessly, transforming the polluted air into fresh, breathable oxygen.
meanings.sent5: The hum of the ozonizers filled the room, signaling the start of the purification process.

meanings.definition: A machine that generates ozone for purification purposes.
meanings.sent1: The hospital uses advanced ozonizers to sanitize medical equipment effectively.
meanings.sent2: Many industries rely on ozonizers to maintain a clean and safe working environment.
meanings.sent3: The malfunctioning ozonizers went haywire, covering everything in a thin layer of ozone.
meanings.sent4: The ozonizers hummed softly, silently purifying the air in the room.
meanings.sent5: The powerful ozonizers quickly eliminated all harmful bacteria in the water supply.
